name: CopyCat
headline: Browser agents for repetitive business processes.
description: CopyCat lets businesses create browser agents to automate their manual and repetitive processes. We created a browser agent builder that lets businesses describe their processes in natural language and instantly get them automated.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:robotic-process-automation; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:ai; location:seattle

founders.name: Abhi Balijepalli, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @ CopyCat. Previously, I co-founded Platter—“Shopify for restaurants”—and scaled it to 100s of restaurants. Platter continues to run on autopilot, with no employees. Before that, I was an engineer on the core meetings infrastructure & monitoring at Zoom, handling 200 million monthly active users at its peak. I grew up in Seattle, WA. Love the PNW.

founders.name: Zyad Elgohary, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of CopyCat. Worked previously with my founders on Platter, where we scaled an idea to a platform serving hundreds of restaurants and processing hundreds of thousands of dollars per month. Before that, I was a software engineer at Okta, where I worked on scaling the Workflows Identity product to a $100m ARR business.

founders.name: Graham Sabin, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @ CopyCat. Previously I was building Shopify for restaurants, serving hundreds of Mom N' Pops. I love finding hacky ways to grow products and long runs.

# Create browser agents for repetitive tasks.
# Create browser agents for repetitive tasks.
Automate your repetitive browser tasks and SOPs with fast, reliable browser agents. Simply describe the process, and Copycat will transform it into an agent that runs seamlessly whenever you need it.
Describe your repetitive browser tasks and instantly transform them into easy-to-use browser agent for your business.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/nj4J6jsjd5DicG7zzMA3Gvj0Bg.webp?scale-down-to=512)

## Enterprise Use Cases
Real use cases from teams and individuals who rely on our platform to automate their browser tasks.
  * ### EHR Automation
Healthcare
Enable seamless EHR data retrieval on a set schedule with automated browser workflows, boosting core business operations effortlessly.
  * ### Data Aggregation
Event Planning
Aggregate event inventory from multiple websites into one streamlined platform, fueling your startup's event planning with real-time data.
  * ### Purchase Planning
Hardware
Automate your searches across various technical websites to find the right parts, check inventory, and reduce manual effort.
  * ### Market Research
Compliance
Automate the search for the right compliance POC during visa planning across hundreds of websites and google sheets data.

## All On The Browser
**Create with Ease: Describe your process for an automation.**
**Multimodality: Crafting prompts can be complex.**
### Schedule Tasks
Schedule a time for when copycat should run. No need to manually run automations.
Show Copycat exactly how you create browser automations.
### Natural Language
Explain your process step by step, or upload a detailed SOP.
### Monitor & Edit Your Agents
Easily edit your agentic workflow and monitor in real time.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/euiN8xzd8NZsJnPHVi6grsblTQ.png)

Add any website. No need to pay for APIs or ask for IT help.

generated_description:
### CopyCat: Automating the Repetitive

**Overview**
Founded in 2024 and based in Seattle, Washington, CopyCat is a startup dedicated to transforming repetitive business processes through innovation. They're part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W25 program, and with a small team of three, they're already making waves in the realm of browser automation.

**Mission**
CopyCat's mission is straightforward: to provide users with browser agents that can automate tedious, repetitive tasks. They've built a platform where businesses can create these agents simply by describing their workflows in natural language. The result? Swift, reliable automation that frees up teams to focus on what really matters.

**How It Works**
The heart of CopyCat is its browser agent builder. Users can input their repetitive tasks, and the platform generates agents that can perform those tasks independently. Imagine saying goodbye to manual order processing, data entry, and web scraping. With CopyCat, you articulate the process, and it spins up an agent for you—easy as pie.

**Product Features**
- **Natural Language Processing**: Describe your process step-by-step, and CopyCat takes care of the heavy lifting.
- **Full Control**: Users can monitor and edit their agents in real time, ensuring everything runs smoothly.
- **No API Hassles**: You can integrate any website without the usual IT headaches.
- **Scheduled Tasks**: Automate your workflows to run on autopilot—no manual intervention needed.

**Use Cases**
CopyCat has already shown its versatility across industries:
- **Healthcare**: Automated retrieval of Electronic Health Records (EHR) data.
- **Event Planning**: Aggregate event inventories from various sites.
- **Hardware**: Streamline parts sourcing from technical websites.
- **Market Research**: Efficiently gather compliance information for visa planning.

**Pricing**
Starting at $500/month, CopyCat offers customized solutions tailored for businesses, including priority support, feature requests, and data privacy options.

**Community and Support**
CopyCat isn't just about etching out processes; it’s about building a community. Users can join their Discord group for collaboration, tips, and support. Plus, with over 500 active members, it’s a growing hub for innovators.

**Conclusion**
With its clever toolset and mission to simplify the nitty-gritty of online tasks, CopyCat is positioned to change the landscape of workflow automation. If you're tired of repetitive tasks eating away at your productivity, CopyCat is worth a look. You can find them at [runcopycat.com](https://runcopycat.com), or book a demo to see firsthand how they can transform your business operations.
